issue.title: notapplicable.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://notapplicable.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnotapplicable.com) ### Comment > The Taco Bell app wont let me add to cart. Its AdGuard at fault. So many weird issues since 26.x. Pretty sure lululemon doesnt work. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/p2b41ib4qv400kko8kk8w8kgkw4gc0op50beghu4og.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/r1g4036pd6o088wo0gk4wcwcw0gs44shdbr788h1fs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.14 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `The taco bell app wont let me add food `
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | `None, turning off AdGuard fixed my issue `

issue.title: naruto.fandom.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://naruto.fandom.com/wiki/Sasuke_Uchiha](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnaruto.fandom.com%2Fwiki%2FSasuke_Uchiha) ### Comment > I had a different Adblock called Adblock pro that I had before installing Adguard and deinstalled it after I installed Adguard. issue.title: www.tradingview.com

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

issue.body:
**Attention:**
If you encounter an ad blocker detection - please enable the pop-up filter in the Annoyances section. Or add the following rules to `User rules`:

```adblock
||securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js$domain=tradingview.com,important
tradingview.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'doubleclick.net')
```

If you encounter any other problem - continue creating the report.

---

issue.title: blackboard.istun.edu.tr

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://blackboard.istun.edu.tr/?new_loc=%2Fultra%2Fstream](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fblackboard.istun.edu.tr%2F%3Fnew_loc%3D%252Fultra%252Fstream) ### Comment > Using Adguard extension blocks me when I try to use my university's blackboard system. It stucks in login page when I try to log in. But when I disable the adguard extension it doesnt even need login informations and I easly use the blackboard system. ``` Username: @paradogs-7 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/6adzhmleod0c4sw0skkoowgco4ooosc6j3sb3xhuio.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/4zzqpcnqv6cc0s48oks40w8sckogs0shueegal24ps.png?nc=1)
